title: Textile, 1920s
description: Polyuchrome block print: - grey-green bowl with large red, pink and lavender flowers with leaves in two shades of green. Bowl is placed on a "plaid" ground of blue-green, grey-green, blue, and black. Condition: soiled. Black "J" stamped on selvage; color dots

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920s.
1920s. printed cotton. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-121.
